title: What are the best criticisms of Foucault? - Quora

response.answer_text: I wanted to see if a new work on Leibniz was available at the bookstore. I went to Cody’s in Berkeley and went to the Philosophy section. There was one lone volume on Leibniz but three full shelves of Foucault. I announced to all present: Foucault is not that important, he is a cultural fad, where is at least a shelf on Leibniz !!!
He takes Nietzsche a bit too seriously and his reflexive antipathy to Marx leads him into numerous political and philosophical errors-into the arms of the Ayatollah and the neoliberals.
